_sText:
English

Hello. I was making this map whole week, everyday 15 hours making. I fall in some kind vortex, but finaly there is! Surf-ski-2 on source surf ski-2-source!!!

Yes yes this is that map waht you thinking, if you wonna see difference between version on cs1.6 and mine you can look on this link to see slideshow.

http://img153.imageshack.us/slideshow/webplayer.php?id=76585851.jpg

I add things like this.

    Count how many times players fall to jail.
    Minimap.
    Flying things on the teleports.
    Better letters on teleports.
    No fall damage.
    Better lighting.
    Better keypad system in secret room.
    Sphere in mario room.
    Human launchers.
    Bigger map.
    Ladders in jail.
    Change flap in jail to disappearing floor.
    Better ramps.
    Better contours.
    Counter restart after 4 sec in new round.
    Change time jail open.
    Better textures.
    And much more.
